thread.title: Towns, Garnett grace Sports Illustrated cover
thread.title_full: Towns, Garnett grace Sports Illustrated cover

title: Towns, Garnett grace Sports Illustrated cover
text:
Towns, Garnett grace Sports Illustrated cover Karl-Anthony Towns and Kevin Garnett will be on the cover of this week's Sports Illustrated. Post to Facebook Towns, Garnett grace Sports Illustrated cover Karl-Anthony Towns and Kevin Garnett will be on the cover of this week's Sports Illustrated.   kare11.com: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/nba/timberwolves/2015/10/20/towns-garnett-grace-sports-illustrated-cover/74303386/   Join the Conversation To   Towns, Garnett grace Sports Illustrated cover Jay Knoll, 8:59 p.m. EDT October 20, 2015 Karl-Anthony Towns and Kevin Garnett will be on the cover of this week's Sports Illustrated. (Photo: Sports Illustrated) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
MINNEAPOLIS - Minnesota Timberwolves Karl-Anthony Towns and Kevin Garnett will be featured on one of four regional covers Sports Illustrated is printing as part of its NBA Preview edition. 
The cover compliments a feature story from SI Senior Writer Lee Jenkins about veteran superstars mentoring their young teammates. Garnett has been in the NBA for 21 years. Towns is preparing for his rookie season. 
The issue will hit newsstands Wednesday. To see all the covers and read more about the issue, click here . 
NBA.com recently surveyed the league's general managers to gather their responses on the best teams, players, coaches, offseason moves and more prior to the 2015-16 NBA season. Some Timberwolves were listed as the most popular responses. 
When asked which player is most likely to have a breakout season, Andrew Wiggins topped the list. Shabazz Muhammed also received some votes from general managers. 
Towns also topped the list when general managers were asked, "Which rookie will be the best player in five years?" Towns finished second to Jahlil Okafor when general managers picked their Rookie of the Year favorite. Zach LaVine and Wiggins received votes in the 'Most Athletic Player' category. The Timberwolves received votes as being one of the most improved teams of the season. 
Minnesota begins the 2015-16 regular season against the Los Angeles Lakers Oct. 28th. Read or Share this story: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/nba/timberwolves/2015/10/20/towns-garnett-grace-sports-illustrated-cover/74303386/ TOP VIDEOS
